content.text:
The artist of the work (<image 1>) on the left is

A. Masaccio
B. Piero della Francesca
C. Fra Angelico
D. Giotto

C. Fra Angelico

The painting depicts the Annunciation, a common subject in Renaissance art, and the style and technique are characteristic of Fra Angelico's work.
Now, output the final answer and nothing else:
